LanguageData.Research_ExtremelySlow.label: extremely slow
LanguageData.Research_ExtremelySlow.description: 연구는 아무런 가치가 없다. 왜 연구 따위에 노력을 하는가?
LanguageData.Research_Fast.label: 빠른
LanguageData.Research_Fast.description: Research is an especially virtuous activity.
LanguageData.Research_None.label: 허용되지 않음
LanguageData.Research_None.description: 기술을 연구하는 것은 부도덕한 행위니 시도조차 하지 말지어다.
LanguageData.Research_Normal.label: 평균
LanguageData.Research_Normal.description: Research is a worthwhile form of work that the community needs.
LanguageData.Research_Slow.label: 느림
LanguageData.Research_Slow.description: Research work just isn't particularly meaningful. Why try hard at it?
LanguageData.Research_VeryFast.label: 매우 빠름
LanguageData.Research_VeryFast.description: Research is among the most meaningful acts a person can perform.
LanguageData.Research_VerySlow.label: 매우 느림
LanguageData.Research_VerySlow.description: Research work is unworthy of serious respect. Better not to be seen trying hard at it.
